title: Multi-page Valentine flow + updated Reasons cards with heart micro-animations

requirements.summary: Refactor the Valentine experience into a four-screen flow (Hero → Reasons → Proposal → Final Love Note) with persistent romantic theme, floating hearts, smooth animations, and gesture-safe background music across screens.
acceptanceCriteria: The app presents four distinct pages/screens: Hero, Reasons I Love You, Proposal, and Final Love Note (not a single long page of sections).
The “Start” button on the Hero page navigates the user to the Reasons page.
The user can progress from Reasons to Proposal and from Proposal to Final Love Note via clear UI navigation (buttons/links), without requiring manual scrolling to reach the next experience.
Background music remains available across pages and continues to follow gesture-safe playback requirements (no forced autoplay on iPad Chrome).
No photo or gallery sections are added anywhere in the multi-page experience.

file_operations.description: Replace the current scroll-based single-page sections with an explicit 4-screen state machine (Hero, Reasons, Proposal, Final). Wire navigation actions (Start/Next/Back/Continue) between screens; keep FloatingHearts, ConfettiBurst, and overall romantic theme. Continue using shadcn-ui Button/Card compositions for UI controls and containers; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create a dedicated Hero screen component containing the title/subtitle and “Start” CTA, designed to fill the viewport and trigger navigation to the Reasons screen. Use shadcn-ui Button for the CTA; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create a dedicated Reasons screen component that renders the Reasons grid and includes clear navigation controls (e.g., Back to Hero, Next to Proposal) without requiring scrolling to proceed. Use shadcn-ui Button for navigation; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create a dedicated Proposal screen component preserving the existing Yes/No interaction (including evasive No behavior) and adding a clear navigation path to the Final Love Note screen (e.g., a Continue button that appears when appropriate). Use shadcn-ui Button for actions; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create a dedicated Final Love Note screen component (no gallery/photos) with the existing handwritten/cursive styling and a clear optional navigation action (e.g., restart/back) if desired. Use shadcn-ui Card for the note container; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Ensure background music behavior remains gesture-safe across screen navigation: keep the fixed control visible on all screens, avoid marking music as playing unless playback actually starts, and provide an explicit user control to start/stop playback if autoplay is blocked on iPad Chrome. Use shadcn-ui Button for controls; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Update the Reasons screen to render exactly 8 interactive animated cards and pre-fill them with Abubakar’s provided messages verbatim.
acceptanceCriteria: The Reasons page contains exactly 8 cards (no more, no fewer).
Each card displays one of the provided messages exactly as written (verbatim).
Cards have interactive animation: flip or glow on hover where available, and remain usable on touch devices (tap to reveal/flip works).

file_operations.description: Add a single exported constant list containing exactly 8 Reasons messages, matching Abubakar’s provided copy verbatim (including punctuation and ellipses), to be used as the sole data source for Reasons cards.

Extract the existing flip-card UI into a reusable ReasonCard component that supports hover flip on desktop and tap-to-toggle on touch devices, using shadcn-ui Card/CardContent for structure. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Wire the Reasons page to import the 8-message list and render exactly 8 ReasonCard instances (no additional placeholders). Ensure navigation controls remain present and no photo/gallery content is introduced. Use shadcn-ui Button for navigation; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Remove the inline reasons array and any inline ReasonCard implementation from App, delegating Reasons rendering to ReasonsPage so the app guarantees exactly 8 cards with the new verbatim copy.

requirements.summary: Add subtle heart-themed micro-animations on Reasons cards triggered by hover/flip/tap, optimized for smooth performance on iPad Chrome.
acceptanceCriteria: Interacting with a Reasons card (hover on desktop and tap/flip on touch devices) triggers a subtle heart animation effect associated with that card.
Animations do not block scrolling or tapping, and do not noticeably degrade performance on iPad Chrome.

file_operations.description: Add a lightweight, card-local heart micro-animation that triggers when the card flips/opens (and on hover where available), using minimal DOM elements and pointer-events-none overlays so it never blocks taps/clicks. Keep animation purely CSS-driven where possible for iPad Chrome performance. Verify shadcn-ui Card composition usage instructions before implementing.

Add the required CSS keyframes/utilities for the card-local heart micro-animation (subtle scale/float/fade), and any supporting utility classes needed by ReasonCard. Ensure animations are lightweight and do not introduce global scrolling dependencies.
